title: Self-Directed Mathematics MOOC: Advanced Learning Design Utilizing Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics basics and intermediate applied mathematics knowledge in vocational fields
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment for strengthening practical mathematics competencies for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently analyze job-related mathematical problems and solve them by utilizing peer feedback from discussion boards at least 80% of the time
Perform meaningful interactions (replies, questions, comments) at least twice weekly on online discussion boards to enhance collaborative learning skills
Plan and manage self-directed learning schedules to complete at least 90% of all learning modules (12 theory videos, 15 quizzes, 6 discussion assignments) within the 4-week course

resources: LMS platform (with built-in discussion board functionality)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
